metadata.job_title: Senior Strategic Advisor - Information Management, Access and Privacy

job_posting.ministry_description: The Public Service Commission (PSC) is seeking a proactive, organized, and resourceful team player to join our Corporate Services Division. The successful candidate will support PSC stakeholders and contribute expertise in developing and implementing planning and accountability frameworks and tools, human resource policy, legislation, business improvement for the PSC. This role focuses on information management, access and privacy, legislative business and policy, but offers a diversity of assignments and experiences.

qualifications.education_requirements: Typically, the knowledge and abilities required for this position would be obtained through a degree or post-graduate degree in public policy, administration, or a related discipline coupled with several years of relevant work experience. Professional certification in privacy protection and conducting risks assessments and in information security and records management would be assets.

additional.diversity_statement: We are committed to workplace diversity.
